name: put_task_assignments_id
description:
Updates a task assignment. This endpoint can be
used to update the state of a task assigned to a user.

task_assignment_id.description: The ID of the task assignment.

message.description: An optional message by the assignee that can be added to the task.

resolution_state.description:
The state of the task assigned to the user.

* For a task with an `action` value of `complete` this can be
`incomplete` or `completed`.
* For a task with an `action` of `review` this can be
`incomplete`, `approved`, or `rejected`.

$block: A task assignment defines which task is assigned to which user to complete.
